Screens individuals prior to authorizing access to the information system; b. Rescreens individuals periodically and anytime they move to a new position with a higher risk designation, in accordance with CMS Personnel Security Policy;c. Conducts background investigations in a manner commensurate with OPM, HHS, and CMS Personnel Security policy and guidance;d. Performs reinvestigations for active national security clearances in accordance with guidance provided by current personnel security policy; ande. Refuses employees and contractors access to information systems until they have: 1. Been vetted in accordance with agency policy; and 2.
